author: Lon.TV
description:
Apple is largely criticized for their lack of an AI plan. But the 1987 Knowledge Navigator video shows an interesting concept about how Apple has been thinking about AI agents for a very long time. Could this be what they are working on? I think they are. See more analysis: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIsJJ0Gy1ENvGjbCp7PslRyz and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

Watch the full Knowledge Navigator video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9bjve67p33E

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:42 - Knowledge Navigator Analysis
05:21 - My prediction on Apple's AI strategy
06:42 - My AI Agent Experiments with N8N
11:52 - Conclusion

title: Apple Already Told Us Their AI Plan in 1987 ? My prediction!
